title: WARHAMMER
desc: Alok's holy warhammer, it crushes foes.

title: CHANNEL
desc: Alok channels divine power, healing all allies around him.

title: HOLY JAVELIN
desc: Alok conjures and throws a javelin made of divine light.

title: SHIELD
desc: Alok's shield, it protects against attacks when in use.

title: RAPIER
desc: Dogan's silver rapier, it puts holes in foes.

title: BOMB
desc: Dogan lights and throws a bomb, exploding either within a short time or on impact.

title: SNEAK ATTACK
desc: As an expert in anatomy Dogan knows weak spots to aim for. Gain a 50% critical chance for a limited time.

title: POISON
desc: Dogan poisons his blade, dealing damage over time to foes.

title: ARCANE BLAST
desc: A basic arcane blast, dealing damage with each hit and has a limited range. Colliding with other magic will destroy both this blast and the other magic.

title: FIREBALL
desc: Seki launches an explosive fireball, damaging all foes within range.

title: LIGHTNING BOLT
desc: Seki throws a lightning bolt damaging all it passes through.

title: TELEPORT
desc: Seki visualizes being elsewhere, teleporting him where he wishes.

title: RIFLE
desc: Xan's custom rifle, it has 4 shots which must be reloaded after being fired.

title: FLY
desc: Xan spreads his wings, launching himself into the air and giving himself a speed boost.

title: POWERFUL SHOT
desc: Xan fires a combined shot, using 2 uses of ammo but providing more power. The shot will travel through foes and stun them, but also has extra recoil.

title: QUICKDRAW
desc: Xan draws his revolver, shooting one shot at all within range.

title: FISTS
desc: Gary's fists, they hurt.

title: BLOCK
desc: Defend against attacks.

title: STUNNING STRIKE
desc: Throw a powerful strike that stuns foes

title: THROW RAGER
desc: Throw Rager at an enemy to beat them to a pulp.

title: GLAVE
desc: Darien's glave, it cuts foes to pieces.

title: TOWER SHIELD
desc: Use Darien's tower shield to block attacks

title: SWEEPING STRIKE
desc: Make a large sweeping strike with Darien's Glave

title: LAY ON HANDS
desc: Place Darien's hands on himself or someone else to heal.
